languages.text: "Я — не узница, обреченная биться за своего пленителя. В отличие от тебя, кровожадный полузверь".
"I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."
languages.original_text: "Я — не узница, обреченная биться за своего пленителя. В отличие от тебя, кровожадный полузверь".

traits.locale_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我和你不一样，我可不会为了俘虏我的人而战，你这头嗜血的半畜生。”
languages.original_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."

traits.locale_text: “我和你不一样，我可不会为了俘虏我的人而战，你这头嗜血的半畜生。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Contrairement à vous, je ne suis pas condamnée à me battre pour mes geôliers, espèce de bête sanguinaire. »
languages.original_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."

traits.locale_text: « Contrairement à vous, je ne suis pas condamnée à me battre pour mes geôliers, espèce de bête sanguinaire. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «A diferencia de ti, bestia sanguinaria, no soy una prisionera condenada a luchar por mi captor».
languages.original_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."

traits.locale_text: «A diferencia de ti, bestia sanguinaria, no soy una prisionera condenada a luchar por mi captor».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私は捕獲者に戦う運命を強いられた囚人ではない。あなたとは違うの、血に飢えた半獣人よ」
languages.original_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."

traits.locale_text: 「私は捕獲者に戦う運命を強いられた囚人ではない。あなたとは違うの、血に飢えた半獣人よ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin kein Gefangener, der dazu verdammt ist, für meinen Peiniger zu kämpfen. Im Gegensatz zu Euch, Ihr blutrünstige Halbbestie."
languages.original_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin kein Gefangener, der dazu verdammt ist, für meinen Peiniger zu kämpfen. Im Gegensatz zu Euch, Ihr blutrünstige Halbbestie."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."

languages.text: "Senin gibi kana susamış canavarcıkların aksine ben, beni tutsak edenler için savaşmakla lanetlenmiş bir mahkûm değilim."
languages.original_text: "I am not a prisoner doomed to fight for my captor, unlike you, you bloodthirsty half-beast."

traits.locale_text: "Ben, beni tutsak edenler için savaşmakla lanetlenmiş bir mahkûm değilim seni kana susamış canavarımsı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
